title: Simple Button tutorial
content: In this tutorial you will learn how to generate a switch on your device.

Scan the QR code with your smartphone.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/qrscan.png)

Alternatively, click on _Open in this device_ to open it locally.

Moves the following components to the workspace

the **enabled** component
![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/simplebutton/button.png)

and the **event** component

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/simplebutton/event.png)

Press ![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Log/Log.png) on the sidebar,

move the **print** component

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Log/print.png)

and put the text component in the print component as in the image

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/simplebutton/log.png)

this is to show on the console whether the switch is on or off.

Now add the event component as in the image below

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/simplebutton/blocks.png)
